title: The Soul's Midnight: On Psychics and the CIA (Patreon Clip)
itunes:title: The Soul's Midnight: On Psychics and the CIA (Patreon Clip)
description:
Here's a preview of our latest Patreon exclusive series, The Soul’s Midnight, which sees the Losers put down Stephen King for a moment and talk about some real-life spooky tales. This time around, to accompany their coverage on 1999's Hearts in Atlantis, they're digging into the declassified case files surrounding the CIA's involvement with psychics, specifically with the Stargate Project. They also touch upon related topics like MKUltra, hypnosis, and the Men in Black. Special guest includes Neil McRobert of the Talking Scared Podcast.


Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a member for more exclusive bonus content. This weekend, they’re offering 15% off all annual memberships for 2022. So, there’s really no better time than now to join us in The Barrens.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
